problem.markdown: 3. The oscillation in a ring oscillator is ensured when (x) The number of inverter stages are larger ( ) The rise time is larger ( ) The fall time is larger ( ) The delay of each inverter is smaller
problem.p: 3. The oscillation in a ring oscillator is ensured when

choicegroup.choice: The number of inverter stages are larger
The delay of each inverter is smaller
